{{Wired embedded system |brand=Savant |model=SSC-0007-00 |revision=REV09 |is_manuf=No |pcb_id=050-0036-60 |type=automation controller |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=Freescale |cpu1_model=MCF5234 |cpu1_cspeed=150 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=STMicro |fla1_model=M29W128GL |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model=48LC4M16A2 |ram1_num=2 |serial=yes,, RJ45 console |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Micrel |eth_chip2_model=KSZ8721BL |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=15kV ESD-Protected RS-232 Transceiver;Maxim;MAX3222E;;1;,,, 5V Voltage Monitoring Microprocessor Supervisor;Analog Devices;ADM708;;1;,,, 2K-bit Serial SPI Bus EEPROM;STMicro;M95020;;1;,,, Low-Voltage CMOS 16-Bit Transceiver;ON Semi;MC74LCX16245;;2;,,, Low-Voltage CMOS Octal Buffer Flow Through Pinout;ON Semi;MC74LCX541;;1;,,, Low-Dropout Regulator;TI;TPS73701;;1;,,, Dual 2A 500kHz Wide Input Range Buck Regulator;TI;LM26400Y;;1;,,, Octal Bus Transceiver w/3-State Output;TI;SN74LVC245A;;1;,,, Octal Dual Supply Translating Transceiver;NXP;74LVC4245A;;1;,,, Surge Stopper;Analog Devices;LT4356;;1; |flags=IR receiver, IR transmitter |oui_eth=00:1A:AE }} {{TagLine|Smart Controller}}
===Specifications=== *CPU: ''[[Freescale]]'' MCF5234 @150MHz (Coldfire) *Storage: 16MB Parallel (NOR) Flash *Memory: 32MB (SDR) DRAM *Network: 1x Fast Ethernet port
